page.title: 01GENERAL FACTS ST.NINIANS.
page.content: Our block can be divided into various sections. St.Ninians and Whins of Milton have grown and are now suburbs of Stirling. Cambusbarron village has retained its identity and is separated from the other two by a motorway. The remaining area is farm and woodland.We have a large wellrun hospital with good feeder services.Education to the eighteenth year is provided with minimal travel.Headquarters of police and local government are within our block.There are numerous small shops and businesses,two hypermarkets which serve a large area,and a quarry which is controlled outwith our area.Of historical interest we have a tower and church and a Monument commerating the Battle of Bannockburn. (L.JOHNSTONE,L.RAWDING,D.SCOTLAND, N.FITZGERALD,N.PATTERSON MRS. N.McGRANDLES)
